docs.title: Kusi's Knowledgebase
docs.text: This blog is a collection of useful things that I need in everyday work from time to time and maybe can help someone else.

docs.title: Author
docs.text: Markus König, Senior Sharepoint/M365 Expert and Developer, Garaio AG, Bern, Switzerland

docs.title: Update CA Content Database
docs.text:
$wa = Get-SPWebApplication -IncludeCentralAdministration | Where { $_.DefaultServerComment -eq "SharePoint Central Administration v4"}
Get-SPContentDatabase -WebApplication $wa |% { Upgrade-SPContentDatabase -Identity $_.Id -Confirm:$false }

docs.title: New Developer Certificate
docs.text:
Import-Module WebAdministration
Set-Location IIS:\SslBindings
New-WebBinding -Name "Default Web Site" -IP "*" -Port 443 -Protocol https
$c = New-SelfSignedCertificate -DnsName *.myexample.com,*.my.com -CertStoreLocation cert:\LocalMachine\My

Open mmc.exe and add Server Certificate

Copy New Certificate from Personal to Trusted Root Certifiaction Authorities

Open IIS and change the Binding Certificate

docs.title: Error: cannot be loaded because running scripts is disabled on this System
Get all loaded Assemblies in Powershell
docs.text: [System.AppDomain]::CurrentDomain.GetAssemblies() | Where-Object Location | Sort-Object -Property FullName | Select-Object -Property Name, Location, Version | Out-GridView

docs.title: Close Connection to reconnect with another user
Mobile View
docs.text:
For a better mobile view feeling you can add in the Master Page in the Head Element.

<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">

docs.title: gulp dist for SP2016/19
docs.text:
gulp dist replace the steps:

gulp clean
gulp build
gulp bundle --ship
gulp package-solution --ship

Install gulp-sequence

npm install gulp-sequence --save-dev

edit file gulpfile.js

'use strict';
if (process.argv.indexOf('dist') !== -1){
process.argv.push('--ship');
}
const gulp = require('gulp');
const build = require('@microsoft/sp-build-web');
const gulpSequence = require('gulp-sequence');
build.addSuppression(`Warning - [sass] The local CSS class 'ms-Grid' is not camelCase and will not be type-safe.`);
gulp.task('dist', gulpSequence('clean', 'bundle', 'package-solution'));
build.initialize(gulp);
